experience.role_description: SDLC for USPS Postal stores software CD installation development, procedures & support. Wrote SQL Scripts for reporting, created test plans, updated test plans, created defects in HP Quality Center, created Business Object Queries, tested and created EDW queries, created reports in Business Objects, created Deep dive Analysis reports, collaborated with customers on reporting requirements, ensured data integrity, created Business requirement documents, worked with data analysts on new requirements and algorithms through SAS.

Wrote SQL Scripts for reporting, created test plans, updated test plans, created UAT testing, created defects in HP Quality Center, scheduled deployment for Hospital reporting contract, triaged defects, worked with release manager on development and defect monitoring, created reports for management on defect status, fixed production reports, worked with BA's on new requirements documentation.

Business Analyst for DOL ICERT system application modules. Analyzed business problems, gathered information from users, defined work problems, designed computer programs and procedures, developed specifications, prepared work diagrams and data flow charts, coordinated system tests, recommended computer equipment changes.

Moved customer and internal reporting to Business Objects, developed Helpdesk standard reports, used Business Object XI applications, ran EDW reports, Crystal reports, and deep dive analysis, created multiple reporting for Helpdesk, converted reporting from GEMS Remedy to EDW-Business Object, created Crystal reports, acted as USPS Postal Stores Project Manager, developed and tested 3rd party applications, wrote support procedures, setup and implemented training, collaborated on customer requirements, created technical documentation.
